itunes:title: Episode 333 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/23/18 - Special Guest UFC Announcer Jon Anik
title: Episode 333 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/23/18 - Special Guest UFC Announcer Jon Anik
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with UFC announcer Jon Anik hours before he calls the biggest fight of his life Mcgregor/Khabib to discuss his career.  Ross and Dan also make their picks of the week, including the World Series.
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with UFC announcer Jon Anik hours before he calls the biggest fight of his life Mcgregor/Khabib to discuss his career.  Ross and Dan also make their picks of the week, including the World Series.
